alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Thayer; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 2:34AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Nuckolls, southeastern Webster and western Thayer Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 234 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Guide Rock, or 33 miles south of Hastings, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Nelson around 245 AM CDT. Nora around 250 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ruskin, Oak, Deshler, Hebron and Carleton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
